generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved surface with tram tracks and painted road markings, indicating it is a road.
- sidewalk: There is a paved area adjacent to the road, separated by poles and trees, which is designated for pedestrians and is elevated slightly from the road.
- building: Multiple multi-story buildings with windows and commercial signs are visible along the street.
- vegetation: Several trees with green leaves are present along the sidewalk and in front of the buildings.
- traffic sign: A circular "No Parking" sign and a "No Stopping" sign are visible on a pole.
- pole: Several vertical poles are visible, including one holding the traffic signs.
- car: A dark gray hatchback car is parked on the side of the road.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is parked on the sidewalk near the trees.
- person: A person can be seen walking on the sidewalk in the background.
- truck: A white van is parked on the side of the road.
- train: The tram tracks on the road indicate the presence of a train (tram) system.
- bus: No bus is visible in the image.
